I agreed that the rate of earning points with Citi-rewards with Amaze is quite constant provided you spent on the correct category. Suggest you check the bill and try to tally the points with the transaction charged. Sometimes there will be a miss as I need to remember to change the cards in Amaze & I forgot.
all work so depending on you like cashback or miles more.
Did you factor in the rounding down of points? All transactions are rounded down to the nearest dollar before points are awarded

You may not believe it but SIMBA global roaming worked very very well for me. Locally sometimes you get spots of bad receptivity but their roaming has been stellar for me.Tested Germany - Frankfurt/Munich  Dubai and ASEAN countries.Just make sure you set the APN correctly.Also  very cheap. $12 plan gives 7GB global roam data.People from SG calls you for free and you can call SG mobile for free back.
My main prob with Simba is local usage haha. But it's very good as sim for secondary number/phone.
